attributes.title: Trash
attributes.review: So i’ve been using the app for a couple of days at first it was fine but then it got real slow, the app wont let me click any of the options and it lags like crazy. Sometimes when i open the app the screen goes black and kicks me out.

attributes.title: DON’T download this app!!!!!
attributes.review: This app literally gave my little sisters and me  a heart attack I was with her sitting and then a big orange man popped up on my screen I’m telling you we got rushed to the hospital it was pretty terrible. We have never seen anything so scary like that before but 0/10 would not recommend 😒👎🏼 !!!!!

attributes.title: Just no
attributes.review: So I’m not only here to get this app banned for TikTok. BUT, I’m here to help out our country. Some of the things trump has said in the few years he’s been the president just haven’t been very respectful and responsible of himself. I don’t know where he’s taking our country but it is for sure not uphill.

attributes.title: L
attributes.review: We all know why you actually want to ban tiktok. You feel threatened, coward. Gen z doesn’t want an old man like you to be president and we should get a say in that considering we’re gonna live longer than ANY of you. Even if tiktok is gone we will still be here and we will still find ways.

attributes.title: Awful app
attributes.review: The worst app ever. Super glitchy and hard to get around. It has so many bugs that it made my fun super slow and hard to use. My eyes hurt from looking at the pictures and words that are on this disgusting app. Please don’t download, it will ruin your phone and your life!!! Worst. App. Ever.

attributes.title: 💕✨🧚Ew🧚🏻‍♀️✨💕
attributes.review:
I can’t believe I didn’t hear of gen z’s amazing plan to get this deleted sooner! It’s great so Imma leave some fairy comments
✨💕🧚🏽Making America great again might mean your death🧚✨💕

attributes.title: HORRIBLE APP!!!
attributes.review: this app is really bad. i opened it and i was greeted to this alien sort of animal. i dont know how to explain it but i was scared for my life!!! i dont want to open the app again but what i saw was orange and was really ugly. they also looked like a ✨racist✨,✨ rapist✨ as well!! I DONT RECOMMEND THIS APP. also it was really glitchy and it kept kicking me outta the app. I REAPEAT I DO NOT RECOMMEND THIS APP!!!✨

attributes.title: Worst app ever
attributes.review: This app has been giving me so many problems that I get so mad and punch my wall. I now have polkadot punch holes on my walls because I’ve gotten so angry so many times because of this stupid app. This app needs to be deleted because it’s going it cost me so much money to fix my walls. Run me back my money Trump. PS I DID NOT GET MY STIMULUS CHACK. TRUMP WILL NOT GET MY VOTE BECAUSE OF THAT

attributes.title: I hate this app ❤️
attributes.review: I know everyone’s rating it 1 star for the pranks but honestly this is terrible. Trump is way too spammy with his messages, like can you take it down to 1 message a day please? Also the app took forever to download that I forgot I downloaded it by the time it was done. So anyways 1 star :)

attributes.title: Terrible 🤢🤢🤬
attributes.review:
This app tracked me!! I was in my home having a nice day when a swat team busted down my door and asked if I supported Trump when I said no they stole my lamp that I bought from the Dollar Tree last year. They also called me old and dusty which I found very offensive, very very rude!!!!!!!!🤬🤬🤬🤬🤬🤬🤢🤢🤮🤮🤮🤧🧚🏻💫

                                 BLM
